pr_title: Bugfix/search portlet do not support new search UI

timeline.message: Support quick search portlet for new Search UI.

Support converting query strings to search options
in Selection Session.

Don't convert query strings to search option
if there is a search option in history.

Don't manipulate browser history for the initial search
if the search option is the default one.

timeline.author: edalex-ian

replies.bodyText: Oops.... URL.getQuery() returns null if there is no query, so that should be basicUrl.getQuery() == null.
replies.author: edalex-ian
